Posts.Content: Tuesday, July 5, 2011 Regarding alkalinizing, another option would be to read and implement the info at http://www.angelfire.com/oh4/befree/MagicJuiceCombo.html It's important that the juice be 100% juice and not some sugar-containing "drink". or a mixture of other juices. Stick strictly with 100% orange juice, and 100% ruby red grapefruit juice. Do NOT use orange "drink" or ruby red grapefruit "drink".
Posts.Title: Maintaining Alkaline ph For Cancer Prevention
